attributes.action: Reject the newly created olympic logo for london and restore the one that won the games!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new olympic logo that has been created for the 2012 olympic games is a backward step it does not have any kind of passion or involke a feeling of national pride. The logo that it replaced though simple had these traits and I urge the prime minister to ask the olympic committee restore the logo.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
